reuters.title: FISCHER-WATTS, HORIZON GOLD <HRIZ.O> TEST MINE
reuters.body: <Fischer-Watts Gold Co Inc> said it and Horizon Gold Shares Inc have begun sampling their jointlyl-held Rich Hill Placer Prospect mine in Yavapai County, Arizona. The 60-day sampling program begins today and will consist of over 2,000 cubic yards of placer gravels taken from over 40 sample sites. Reuter 
